Javascript.description: Javascript is used by programmers across the world to create dynamic and interactive web content like applications and browsers. JavaScript is so popular that it's the most used programming language in the world, used as a client-side programming language by 97.0% of all websites.

quiz.question: Which of the following keywords is used to define a variable in Javascript?
Which one of the following also known as Conditional Expression:
In JavaScript, what is a block of statement?
options: block that combines a number of statements into a single compound statement
both conditional block and a single statement
block that contains a single statement
quiz.answer: both conditional block and a single statement
